Package GeneticAlgorithm

Class GeneticAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • GeneticAlgorithm.GeneticAlgorithm
  • public class GeneticAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Martim Viana Class responsible for executing the genetic algorithms specified, as well as operating on the population by calling, various methods during the algorithm's execution.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      private void iterate​(java.util.Random r, int generation)
      Iterate a generation of the genetic algorithm, according to methods chosen by the developer and criteria chosen by the user.
      void run()
      Execute the iterative deepening genetic algorithm based on chosen user criteria

      Run the genetic algorithm according to a specific amount of generations.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GeneticAlgorithm

        public GeneticAlgorithm​(java.util.Random r,
                        Plate[] problems,
                        int initialSize,
                        int generationMax,
                        int moveThreshold,
                        boolean SHOW_INFO_DURING_RUN)
        Class constructor
        Parameters:
        r - Random number generator used for generating the initial population
        problems - Problems that each individual needs to solve.
        initialSize - Initial amount of individuals in the population.
        generationMax - Maximum number of generations that the runGenerations method will use.
        moveThreshold - Maximum gene size.
        SHOW_INFO_DURING_RUN - True to show debug info, false otherwise.

    • Method Detail

      • runGenerations

        public void runGenerations​(java.util.Random r)
        Run the genetic algorithm according to a specific amount of generations.
        Parameters:
        r - Random number generations

      • runUntilFound

        public void runUntilFound​(java.util.Random r)
        Execute the genetic algorithm, stopping only when a solution was reached.
        Parameters:
        r - Random number generator.

      • iterate

        private void iterate​(java.util.Random r,
                     int generation)
        Iterate a generation of the genetic algorithm, according to methods chosen by the developer and criteria chosen by the user.
        Parameters:
        r - Random number generator
        generation - Number indicating current generation count.

      • run

        public void run()
        Execute the iterative deepening genetic algorithm based on chosen user criteria
